help.i101: Click inside of the Filter Area to begin a new filter
help.i102: Click anywhere inside of the Filter Area to modify the filter
help.i103: Select a field or parenthesis from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i104: Select an operator from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i105: Type the value; use Backspace to delete, Enter or Right Arrow to complete
help.i106: Select calculation elements from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i107: Use Left Arrow to edit the value; hit Space Bar and select a field to continue
help.i108: Build calculation by selecting elements; hit Space Bar if the menu is hidden
help.i109: Use your mouse to pick a date
help.i111: Select a clause or parenthesis from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i112: Use Arrows, Home, End, Tab, Backspace or Delete keys to edit this filter
help.i113: Hit Space Bar to insert a new value; use Right Arrow to edit existing value
help.i114: Hit Space Bar to bring up the date picker
help.i115: Delete the date or select a clause from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i116: Use your mouse to pick the time; click OK to select it
help.i117: Hit Space Bar to bring up the time picker
help.i118: Delete the time or select a clause from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i119: Select a value from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i120: Delete the value or select a clause from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden
help.i121: Use Left Arrow to edit, Backspace to delete; hit Space Bar to continue
help.i122: Make your selection; hit Space Bar if the menu is hidden
help.i123: Type or select the parameter's value; hit Space Bar if selection is hidden
help.i126: Create a new filter or select an existing one for editing
help.i127: Select a new field from the menu to replace the current one
help.i129: Select a new operator from the menu to replace the current one
help.i130: Select a new clause from the menu to replace the current one
help.i131: Type or select a new value to replace the current one
help.i132: Pick a new date or select a field from the menu to replace the current one
help.i133: Pick a new time or select a field from the menu to replace the current one
help.i134: Select a new value from the menu to replace the current one
help.i135: Select a collection field from the menu; hit Space Bar if it's hidden

errors.e101: Your browser does not allow access to clipboard. Use Internet Explorer version 7 and up.
errors.e102: This filter is invalid. Hover over each highlighted element for details.
errors.e103: Name of the filter cannot be blank
errors.e105: You are about to delete this filter. All other filters that may reference it will be affected. This action cannot be undone. Continue?
errors.e106: You cannot submit an empty filter
errors.e107: The highlighted filter elements could not be located in the current source object. Please update this filter or roll back all changes made to the source object.

validation.v102: The next element must be an operator
validation.v103: The next element must be either a value or an in-rule method
validation.v104: The next element must be a clause, a right parenthesis, or an end of a source section
validation.v105: The next element must be either a left parenthesis, a function, a field, or a beginning of a source section
validation.v107: The data types of this element and its operator do not match
validation.v108: The data types of this operator and its value do not match
validation.v109: Too many parentheses on this side of the equation
validation.v110: This and the next element cannot be of the same type
validation.v113: The next calculation element must be either a field, an in-rule method, or a number
validation.v114: The next element must be either a right parenthesis or a math operator
validation.v115: The next element of a calculation must be either a field, an in-rule method, a number or a left parenthesis
validation.v116: The first element of a calculation must be either a field, an in-rule method, a number or a left parenthesis
validation.v117: A date value is expected for this element
validation.v118: A time value is expected for this element
validation.v119: A numeric value is expected for this element
validation.v120: The only allowed operators for empty string values are IS and IS NOT
validation.v121: The value of this numeric element is out of the allowed minimum-maximum range
validation.v122: The length of the value of this string element exceeds the maximum allowed limit
validation.v123: The filter cannot contain multiple IF flow elements
validation.v125: The next element must be either a parameter or end of function
validation.v126: The end of function is expected
validation.v127: The next element must be either a comma or end of function
validation.v129: This parameter has an incorrect data type
validation.v130: This must be the last parameter of the function
validation.v131: The data types of this value element and its field do not match
validation.v132: Different clause types on the same level. Change clause(s) or use parentheses.
validation.v133: Could not locate this element in the source object
validation.v134: This value belongs to an element that could not be located in the source object
validation.v135: This filter causes (or is in) a circular reference
validation.v141: The next element must be a collection field of reference type
validation.v142: The next element must be a beginning of a source section
validation.v143: The next element is invalid in the current source section context
validation.v144: This element cannot exist inside of the evaluation type rule
validation.v145: The type or value of the enumeration cannot be loaded

numeric.lessOrEqual: is less than or equal to
numeric.greaterOrEqual: is greater than or equal to

labels.emptyRuleArea: - click here to begin a new filter -
